file.name: spec.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.cloud.wazuh.com/v2
    description: Wazuh Cloud API
info:
  title: Wazuh Cloud API
  description: "Manage your Wazuh Cloud account"
  version: "2.0.0"
paths:
  /storage/token:
    post:
      tags:
        - storage
      summary: "Generate a token to access the cold storage."
      description: |
        Wazuh Cloud cold storage is located in AWS S3. This endpoint returns a temporary AWS token
        to be used in AWS S3 API (s3:ListBucket and s3:GetObject actions).
      security:
        - api_key: []

      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/RequestToken"

      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Successful"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Token"
        "401":
          description: "Unauthorized"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BasicError"
        "403":
          description: "Forbidden"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BasicError"
        "415":
          description: "Unsupported media type"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BasicError"
        "429":
          description: "Too many requests"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BasicError"
        "500":
          description: "Internal server error"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BasicError"
  /info:
    get:
      summary: Get deployment info of the service
      tags:
        - info
      security:
        - api_key: []
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DeploymentInfo"
        "401":
          description: Unauthorized
        "403":
          description: Forbidden
        "500":
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BasicError"

components:
  securitySchemes:
    api_key:
      type: apiKey
      name: x-api-key
      in: header

  schemas:
    RequestToken:
      type: object
      required:
        - environment_id
      properties:
        token_expiration:
          type: integer
          minimum: 900
          maximum: 3600
          example: 3600
          format: int32
        environment_cloud_id:
          type: string
          example: "13245356356"
      additionalProperties: false

    Token:
      type: object
      properties:
        environment_cloud_id:
          type: string
          pattern: \S+
          maxLength: 64
          example: 0123456789ab
        aws:
          type: object
          properties:
            s3_path:
              type: string
              pattern: \S+
              example: wazuh-cloud-cold-us-east-1/0123456789ab
            region:
              type: string
              pattern: (us(-gov)?|ap|ca|cn|eu|sa)-(central|(north|south)?(east|west)?)-\d
              example: us-east-1
            credentials:
              type: object
              properties:
                access_key_id:
                  type: string
                  pattern: \S+
                  maxLength: 115
                  example: "mUdT2dBjlHd...Gh7NniyZKR5If"
                secret_access_key:
                  type: string
                  pattern: \S+
                  maxLength: 115
                  example: "qEzCk63a224...5aB+e4fCDBR0G"
                session_token:
                  type: string
                  pattern: \S+
                  maxLength: 113
                  example: "MRgpt7HIuoA...4o4BXSAcPfUD8"
                expires_in:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                  minimum: 900
                  maximum: 3600
                  example: 3600
          additionalProperties: false
      additionalProperties: false
    
    DeploymentInfo:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        version:
          type: string
          example: "v0.60.6"
          description: Service version
        revision:
          type: string
          example: "6011"
          description: Service revision
        timestamp:
          type: string
          example: "2021-02-02T14:24:08.975Z"
          description: Deployment timestamp

    BasicError:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - message
        - status_code
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
          example: "Not found"
          description: A human readable brief message about the type of error
        errors:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              message:
                type: string
                example: "Environment with Cloud ID 'ig564fst342a' could not be found"
          description: (Optional) An array or errors describing what happened
        status_code:
          type: number
          example: 404
          description: HTTP status code of the response
